#include<iostream>

#include<cstdlib>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

   long long t,i,fib[40],n,check;

   cin>>t;

   //Implementation of fibonacci series using arrays

   //use of arrays simplifies the process of finding fibonacci series

   //this is done by storing fibonacci series numbers obtained in an array and using it for findind next one

   //array fib stores fibonacci numbers starting from 0

   // count checks whether is a number is fibonacci or not depending on the value of count ,ie, 1 or 0

   fib[0]=0;

   fib[1]=1;

   for(i=2;i<40;i++)
   {

     fib[i]=fib[i-1]+fib[i-2];

   }

   //cout<<fib[40]<<endl;

   while(t--)
   {

     cin>>n;

     check=0;

     for(i=0;i<40;i++)
     {

       if(fib[i]==n)
       {

         check=1;

         break;

       }

     }

     if(check == 1)

     cout<<"Yes\n";

     else cout<<"No\n";

   }

   return 0;

}
